EmailTemplate.name: North America account set up
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to BendixKing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
***North American Dealers only***
Hello XXX,
I would like to welcome you to the BendixKing family of dealers. My name is _______________, and I would like to assist you with your dealer onboarding.
Please provide the account numbers once available so I can expedite your onboarding process.
A. Line Replacement Units (LRU’s) -BK catalog sales
Boeing/Aviall Distributors - https://www.aviall.com/aviallstorefront/ (for your certified product purchases)
Please follow these steps in-order-to get your account set up. If you already have an Aviall account, please provide it in response to this email.
1. Contact your Aviall regional representative below.
2. [ CSR – Insert from Aviall look-up table ]
3. Report back to me that your account has been confirmed set up and provide the account number back to this email.
4. I will also request appropriate access to all internal channels as well as getting your dealer discounts applied. EDMO Distributors - https://www.edmo.com/ (for your experimental product purchases)
1. Please fill out attached forms for your EDMO account set up and send to accounting@EDMO.com Attn: Harold
2. Report back to me that your account has been confirmed set up and provide the account number in response to this email.
3. I will also request appropriate access to all internal channels as well as getting your dealer discounts applied.
B. Honeywell/ Myaerospace - https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en (for piece parts, warranty claims, SPEX exchange, Technical publications and BendixKing Dealer portal access request)
Please follow these steps in getting your account set up. If you already have a Honeywell/Myaerospace account, please provide this in response to this email.
1. Go to this link and register as new user – follow the instruction provided during this process https://vhpwas.honeywell.com/dma/index.html
2. Report back to me when your account has been confirmed as being set up and provide the account number in response to this email.
3. I will also request appropriate access to all internal channels as well as getting your dealer discounts applied.
I will update you as soon once I get the confirmation that your account/s have been set up.
Thank you for your patience and we appreciate having you onboard.
Best Regards,
[CSR Signature template]
